name: moebius
description: Command-Line tool to find and download comics (As well as NodeJS module)

scripts.lint: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint bin lib test && node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs -c test/.jscsrc test && node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs -c .jscsrc lib bin
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.push: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Olivier Ory
